name: Digital Winds
overview:
Digital Winds provides wireless technology from Command and Control, Situational Awareness, to Public Safety and Search and Rescue solutions in support of your mission critical communication needs. Headquartered near Colorado Springs, CO we are focused exclusively on providing organizations with end-to-end customized wireless communications. Simply put, Digital Winds delivers uncompromised services to meet your business needs.

Our expertise is derived from…

  • All inclusive end-to-end wireless communciation products and services.
  • Research, develop, and deliver solutions based on unique Customer requirements
  • Provide user friendly, deployable wireless capabilities based on IEEE Industry Standards for Wi-Fi, Wi-Max, Microwave, ELMR, LTE, 4G, FemtoCell, Bluetooth, BGAN, and Ku/Ka Band Satellite applications
  • Deliver wireless control, sensor, and monitoring solutions using Internet Protocol as a common reference
  • Leveraging industry leading expertise and partnerships with best of class technology providers to ensure solutions meet your needs
  • Experienced professionals dedicated to delivering superior services from design to maintenance and full life-cyle support

We are a Native American owned, SDVOSB small business entity with large scale business operating principles.

Currently developing emerging wireless technologies and pursuing SBIR Grants through National Science Foundation and Department of Transportation.
